title: Emma Roberts gets very close to 'ex' Evan Peters as he devours a burger lunch

text:
Never has being broken up looked so friendly.
While few can resist a tasty freshly-made burger, it appears it was more than the smell of a patty grilled to perfection that was enticing Emma Roberts to get so close to Evan Peters.
The pair called off their engagement back in June, but on Thursday they looked very much like a couple as they met for lunch in West Hollywood, California.
Scroll down for video
Lunch date: While few can resist a tasty freshly-made burger, it appears it was more than the smell of a patty grilled to perfection that was enticing Emma Roberts to get so close to Evan Peters in West Hollywood, California, on Thursday
While 25-year-old Emma skipped the food portion of their lunch meet up, her former fiance certainly was not holding back.
The 29-year-old - whose birthday was January 20 - was in seventh heaven as he enjoyed a burger, fries and a drink at Counter Burger.
While the American Horror co-stars have not officially said they have reconciled, in recent months they have been seen together more and more.
Even more telling, is that just last week Evan may have quietly confirmed they are back on.
Tasty treat: While 25-year-old Emma skipped the food portion of their lunch meet up, her former fiance certainly was not holding back
Subtle confirmation? While the American Horror co-stars have not officially said they have reconciled, in recent months they have been seen together a lot and just last week Evan posted a video on Instagram mentioning he had a girlfriend
The star posted a quick video from the Bachelor - which is a favourite show of Emma's - of one of the women vying for Ben Higgins' heart looking as though she's screaming.
Evan wrote: 'How I feel on the inside when my girlfriend "forces" me to watch The Bachelor.'
While he did not say the girlfriend was his former fiancee, with all the time the pair have spent together of late it seems very likely they are back to being boyfriend and girlfriend at the very least.
Casually sweet: For their lunch, the petite star wore a dark flowing dress with a fitted cardigan and sneakers
The pair in started dating in 2012 and became engaged in 2013 but they certainly had a rocky road, that saw Emma arrested for domestic assault during their romance.
Their lunch date comes just a month after Emma said she was 'over' the split in an interview with Allure Magazine.
She told the January issue she got over their broken engagement by buying new jewellery.
